This game is horrible 
lets start: first off the game should be free for its only purpose is for a garrys mod skin pack second off the guns are UNBALANCED AS HELL either being the equivilent of a nerve gun or the equivilent of a nuclear powered lazer gun that will kill anyone with any armor at any health in 3 shots. You will die so fast you qill queston what the hell killed you and where did they come from, you will have a damage counter come WAY to late for instance once i shot 3 guys down with 5 shots then ran behind the wall and exploded from the guy that i killed from his bullet 5 SECONDS AFTER HE HIT ME, this isnt a bad thign but the game runs smooth as silk i must give it that, maps are designed HORRIBLEY cod maps are more well designed then this maps normal run like this ( terrorists camp in one room with snipers on each hall way and people with shot guns watching the doors from behind a wall, then one grenade is thrown in and kills half the team because of the terribly overpoweredness of nades then everyone rushes in and the terrorists get gunned downed mercifullessly), another point that i kinda stated GRENADES ARE THE EQUIVILENT OF NUCLEAR BOMBS haveing a kill radius far bigger then the blast radius you can actualy see when you hear a grenade you piss yourself and run away as fast as you can, another reason flashbangs serve the same use as normale nades im not jokeing normal nades just dont make your screen go white, the community is horrible people either dont communicate or when they do its an arguement over something, THERE IS NO RANKING SYSTEM makeing this incompleat game/texture pack for garrys mod feal even more incompleat then it already is aheving no itme system either so there is no progression, this is a very bad reason that i have here is the fact that it is VERY VERY HARD to fidn a decent game, last but certantly not least is the fact that since there si no ranking system once you finaly join a agme you will be forced onto the loseing team either faceing pros that could compete in a MLG match and win a fucking gold or silver medal or your fighting hackers.

finaly im saying something that no game haveing the counter strike logo should have but this game is a PURE cash grab by valve working with fistpunch to score a little bit more money of your purchase of garrys mod

and i want a refund

Oh man,10/10 on this game.CSS is a great game. I'm not just saying this for fun or on purpose, but I'm really saying this because I mean it. I have been playing CSS for about 3 years now, and I have to tell you, I am in love with this game. I usually play this game a few times every week and everytime I would play like crazy. I know there are other games that are more better with graphics or guns, such as Counter Strike : Global Offensive and Call Of Duty, but I have to say, this is the best game. I played it for almost 2,000 hours and all the servers there are great. If you plan on playing this game, I would REALLY recommend you to buy and try this game yourself. I have become really addicted to this game since its so good... This game is just all about shooting, which I like mostly. So yeah, 10/10.

Counter-Strike: Source is a very fun and engaging game! I enjoy the first person intensity of it and I think it is an amazing game, the fps is fine and the game always runs smoothly, you can play many gamemodes and I, personally, love getting on with some friends and either playing competitively or just play on Jailbreak and chill out. I love this game and it is probably one of the best FPS' you could get! 10000/10

Наиболее большим изменениям подверглась графика. Заметно улучшились визуальные эффекты. А именно: тени, свет, туман. Давайте все это рассмотрим на примере карты de_dust2. Первое, что я сразу заметил, так это увеличенное кол-во тумана на карте. Также туман стал более реалистичным. Свет на карте стал более ярким и "живым". Из-за этого все текстуры смотрятся более качественно. Кстати разрешение некоторых текстур (например бочек) было увеличено. Еще есть кое-какие изменения в дыме от дымовой гранаты. Когда в нем находишься совсем другое ощущение, нежели в старой ксс. Также появилась тень, падающая от предметов, при свечении на них фонариком.
